name: Finger Racer 3D
description:
PREFECT RACER EXPERIENCE SO FAR!

Now 12 different Sports Cars are Ready! Race 12 unique cars to conquer 7 different tracks with a press of a finger! Delicate Car Models, Unique Tracks and your stronger mindset!

It's time for taking the first steps to be a driving legend. Touch left screen to Turn Left and right screen to Turn Right. No more further complex operations. Focus on your road. You will win! Meanwhile, Future updates with new tracks and cars are already in the works, so start Finger Racer now!

Features:
-Simple Finger Controls
-12 different 3D Sprots Cars
-Special and Unique Tracks
-Cute Graphics
-Realistic effect with Unity3D Engine
